name: ゆうしゃvsドラゴン
description:
Various parties: [/]
・ Let's make a party of 3 people from 7 unique heroes and go on a journey to subdue the Demon King!



Battle: [/]
・ A must-see for an exhilarating battle that kicks off with flashy action in a retro atmosphere!
The amount of damage will increase steadily by increasing the fighting power!



Dogu Collection: [/]
-There are more than 100 types of "Dogu" available in the game, including swords, shields, and medicines!
As many as you collect, your fighting power will increase!



In addition to dropping in stage capture, in-game search for private houses,
Search for treasures in the castle (in-game currency gacha) and subdue the bosses to get them and aim for completeness!

-Equipped with an automatic function. The mystery (special move) is activated automatically!
Further improve training efficiency in double speed mode!
And the ranking mode to compete for the enemy's subjugation score!
Aim for the number one hero!

Steam version additional elements: [/]
Fully compatible with mouse operation and game controller
(Playing with mouse operation is recommended)
Renewed background graphic
Enemy character graphic added

・ Please contact us on the Discord server with your opinions (defects, etc.).
・ Take this opportunity to "Yusha VS Dragon! "Please enjoy.
